channel.title: 2022 Reads on Another Year of Books
channel.description: Recent content in 2022 Reads on Another Year of Books

item.title: Another Year of Books: The 2022 Recap
item.description: And we are back! Briefly, but we’re back. It feels good to be here. Now, I know it’s been a while - an entire year to be exact. I’m wondering if I’ll even remember how to write a post. Then after I write it, will I remember the steps to publish it? Good news - it looks like I did. It’s been a year of no posts and no book photos.
